clause_text: a) The plot area to be handed over to MCGM/Appropriate Authority under AR shall be deducted from the plot area for the purpose of calculation of full permissible BUA under these regulations ) except in respect of proposal processed under Regulation No 33(5),33(7),33(7)(A),33(8),33(9),33(9)(A),33(9)(B),33(10),33(10)(A),33(2
